component.name: Aspect Ratio Copy
component.summary: Copy images with specific aspect ratios

description.p: A utility application that helps you copy images from a source folder to a destination folder based on their aspect ratios. It supports common preset ratios like portrait, landscape, and widescreen, as well as custom ratios.
Features: - Preset aspect ratios for common formats - Custom ratio support - Adjustable tolerance for ratio matching - Real-time progress tracking - Detailed results view showing processed images
